channel.title: nginx on 馬丁沒有派對
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on 馬丁沒有派對

item.title: 安裝 Nginx 1.9+
item.description: 新增nginx.repo # vi /etc/yum.repos.d/nginx.repo 1 2 3 4 5 [nginx] name=nginx repo baseurl=http://nginx.org/packages/mainline/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ gpgcheck=0 enabled=1 安裝Nginx # yum install nginx 啟動服務 # service nginx start # chkconfig --levels 235 nginx on

item.title: CentOS6.5 安裝Nginx
item.description: 新增 Nginx 官方所提供的第三方套件庫 新增一個檔案/etc/yum.repos.d/nginx.repo內容如下 1 2 3 4 5 [nginx] name=nginx repo baseurl=http://nginx.org/packages/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ gpgcheck=0 enabled=1 更新套件庫 # yum

item.title: CentOS6.5 安裝LNMP
item.description: 一、更新rpm 參考連結 MYSQL源 1 2 3 4 CentOS 6 # yum install http://repo.mysql.com/mysql-community-release-el6-5.noarch.rpm CentOS 7 # yum install http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm NGINX源 1 2 3 4 CentOS 6 # yum install http://nginx.org/packages/centos/6/noarch/RPMS/nginx-release-centos-6-0.el6.ngx.noarch.rpm CentOS 7 # yum install http://nginx.org/packages/centos/7/noarch/RPMS/nginx-release-centos-7-0.el7.ngx.noarch.rpm REMI源 最新的PHP版本需要
